name: Cutie Clicker (Cute Animal Clicker)
description:
Plunged into a land of cute animals, you must click on cute animals to become a cutie millionaire! Upgrade your coin production, produce thousands, millions, trillions of coins and use them to get more coins and upgrades.

- 8 upgrades (more coming soon!)

- Cursor upgrades so you can increase your coins per click (coming soon!)

- Gold Mine upgrades so you can increase the amount of coins produced (coming soon!)

- Diamond coins fly from the sky and give you a massive coin boost (coming soon!)

- Ability to buy multiple upgrades at once. (coming soon!)

- Day/Night cycle in real-time with different music and backgrounds.

- Automatically saves progress in an external file.

- Export your save data so you can use it on other computers (coming soon!)

- Stop the day/night cycle and make it always day or night (coming soon!)

- Hand-drawn assets made in Procreate and Clip Studio Paint.

- A beautiful soundtrack fully composed by us.

Join the Discord: https://discord.windowslogic.co.uk

Support our work on Patreon: https://patreon.com/belliescolourcorner and get high-res versions of the assets used in our games, music, art and more.

re! You can also leave a comment to say what you think about Cutie Clicker!
